The purpose study evaluate two different type CBT focus stress , pain , depression response reduce disease activity improve mental health adult RA . This study last 15 month . Initially , participant fill diary report symptom total 30 day . Half study participant undergo 2- 3-hour lab session include blood collection , vital sign measurement , joint exam , questionnaire , interview symptom medical history . All participant randomly assign one follow three group : - People Group 1 participate CBT Pain ( CBT-P ) , focus alter thought process way cope effectively pain . - People Group 2 participate Mindfulness Medication Emotion Regulation ( MM-ER ) , type CBT focus aware one 's emotion regulate . - Group 3 participant serve control receive educational information cause , course , treatment RA . Participants three group attend 2-hour weekly session treatment 8 week . After treatment , participant undergo 2- 3-hour lab session include blood collection , vital sign measurement , joint exam , questionnaire , interview symptom medical history . Participants also fill another daily diary report symptom 30 day . A follow-up questionnaire mail participant 6 month follow end treatment .
